alert.note: Alert for Dickinson; Geary; Riley (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 01 at 2:01AM CDT by NWS Topeka
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Dickinson, western Geary and southwestern Riley Counties through 245 AM CDT... At 201 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Chapman, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Junction City, Ogden, Grandview Plaza and Chapman. This includes Interstate 70 between mile markers 284 and 309. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
